sentences.english: Therefore this sub-item would be taken up at a later meeting.
sentences.chinese: 因此，本分項目將在以後的一次會議上繼續審議。

sentences.english: The bill, which has 31 co-sponsors, has been forwarded to the House Ways and Means Committee for consideration.
sentences.chinese: 這項法案已提交衆議院籌款委員會審議。

sentences.english: It scrutinizes political and economic indicators to determine trades .
sentences.chinese: 它審議的政治和經濟指標，以確定行業。

sentences.english: The legislation, now under review, immediately came under heavy fire.
sentences.chinese: 目前正在審議的該法立即遭到大量的口誅筆伐。

sentences.english: Participants in the meeting deliberated and adopted the China-Singapore Tianjin Eco-city Work Report.
sentences.chinese: 會議審議並通過了《中新天津生態城工作報告》。

sentences.english: You will consider a report on strategies to reduce the harmful use of alcohol.
sentences.chinese: 你們將審議的一份報告涉及減少有害使用酒精的戰略。

sentences.english: NPC deputies will review the draft general provisions of civil law of China.
sentences.chinese: 全國人大代表將審議《民法通則草案》總則。

sentences.english: Want to learn more about how the jury deliberates?
sentences.chinese: 想了解更多關於陪審團審議？

sentences.english: The question of changing the club's rules was mooted at the last meeting.
sentences.chinese: 修改俱樂部章程的問題在上次會議上提出審議了。

sentences.english: Note that Member States can submit new resolutions for WHA consideration.
sentences.chinese: 注意各會員國可提交新的決議供衛生大會審議。

sentences.english: Climate bill - which would bring cuts of 4% from 1990 levels by 2020 - is bogged down in Senate
sentences.chinese: 本國氣候變化法案正在參議院審議中擱置。

sentences.english: The excellence or triteness of your writing was not the matter under consideration.
sentences.chinese: 在卓越或你的寫作陳腐沒有審議的事項。

sentences.english: You will be looking at preparations for the meeting during this session.
sentences.chinese: 本屆執委會期間，你們將審議此次會議的籌備工作。

sentences.english: The proposed standing international criminal court under discussion.
sentences.chinese: 擬設中的常設國際刑事法院的審議情況。

sentences.english: Pending their approval we will work to create the contract.
sentences.chinese: 在審議期間，我們將製作合同文本。

sentences.english: Then he made his deliberations covert.
sentences.chinese: 然後，他進行不公開的審議。

definition: to set/to designate/to stipulate/to provide/to draw up/to formulate (rules etc)/stipulation
to consult with/to talk things over/agreement
